title: runtime: document scvg lines with GODEBUG="gctrace=1"
body:
Setting `GODEBUG="gctrace=1"` outputs GC information in a line format that is well documented in the [pkg/runtime](https://golang.org/pkg/runtime) documentation, but it also emits lines like that:
```
scvg0: inuse: 0, idle: 0, sys: 1, released: 0, consumed: 1 (MB)
scvg1: 0 MB released
scvg1: inuse: 0, idle: 0, sys: 1, released: 0, consumed: 0 (MB)
```
There is no documentation that explains what these values really mean.

Go version: `go 1.6`
